title: A skin line idea for supports
body:
The Kill Steal line.

The idea is pretty simple, skins where your support is totally blinged out with jewelery and items he'd normally not be able to afford.  For example Soraka and Nami could have really expensive looking staves.  Annie could have a solid gold tibbers.  Leona could be wearing expensive fancy armor and have an even more impressive sword.  Blitzcrank and Braum's shield could be made of diamonds.

Basically it'd be what would a support champ look like if that champ was filthy rich.

replies.body: As a kill stealing support, I am 100% behind this idea.

Riot KateyKhaos speaks the truth.

I think more 'Filthy Rich'/Gentlemen style skins is a great idea. Opulence and excess make for fun designs >:D

I was thinking Blitzcrank, y'know with crystals embedded in his eyes and his hook is pure gold

"They say nobody expects the banana to KS...but I expect it to every time."
{{champion:16}}

Shouldn't {{champion:44}} be first on this list? Gold = rocks = shiny = Golden Taric with blinged out hammer. I call him, Swagic. Taric has boss clothes (suit and tie) with black pulled back (cut) hair with pimp glasses.

Next we have {{champion:20}} who has Yeti wear chains with Riot logo and Nunu and Yeti wear shades. Yeti has brass gold knuckles, and Nunu wears gangster clothes with a cap.

We now have {{champion:267}} who sports a tank top with a jean jacket and has a golden tail.

what....did i just watch
Agreed

I call it support tax.

"You are here to farm, I am here to kill. If we have a 'misunderstanding,' someone's going to be sleepin' with the fishes." —{{champion:267}}
Kill Secured*
*GASP* How could you Khatey!
With a Simple Last hit :P
Some of us prefer to be called kill securing supports

With this,we need a kill stolen ADC skinline.
Them all dress as poor,homeless,Great Depression style hobos with poor looking equipment.

I can just imagine Ezreal in rags, shooting dust particles at the enemy since he can't afford his fancy gold energy beams anymore. Graves walking around with a rusted out rifle that makes crackling sounds every time he fires. Varus and Ashe possibly wielding bows made of old rusted out pipes,
And {{champion:119}} with a frown.
Imagine if once we had 3 or 4 skins in both lines, though, Draven inexplicably got a killsteal skin rather than a kill stolen one. I think it'd be a perfect fit.

No, just because she has a stun doesn't make her a support.  Her, Zyra, and other Burst mages have been forcing proper supports out of lane for far too long

You seem to be Implying "Proper" Supports (haha, wat) are Unviable because Bursty mage Supports.

Now let me Direct you to Zyra's Champion Profile, where it says her role is "Mage/Support"

Now let me tell you about a few Champions that Disagree that Burst Mages are forcing out "Proper"(HAHA, WAT) Supports.

Don't forget {{champion:40}} and {{champion:267}} man, if lustboy plays them they must be decent

your point?

Why not have them hold expensive items? Like leona could hold {{item:3031}}
I love this idea
RITO PLS. I would love this SO much. It would be 150% amazing if they wear items from the shop. Maybe just little references here and there.

I don't know if I'd want them to be like you described, or wearing the items themselves.

I guess we could do both.
looking through my old boards post saw this thread...I'm disappointed this has happened yet ...bumperino {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Needs to be called the "Kill Secured" line.
"Kill Secured"

I know this is a skin idea, but I can't help but feel like its telling me on the inside that the supports you've had kill steal, altho not good for bot lane, a kill is a kill, if you don't get the assist "ew" if you do get the assist "yay". Now if the support is just straight up taking it, and they rush Mejais or Sword of the Occult, then i'd be a little concerned cause usually thats how my team throws games, is the support is just going around ksing hard, and then dies cause, they are you know, the support. That's why i've gotten into the support role, is so that doesn't happen lol.

I pretty much main support, and while i'd never touch my laner's farm, when we go for a kill, everything's fair game. That said, getting a mejai's or sword of the occult as a support is just stupid. Get a Rod of Ages or something...

That feeling when {{champion:89}} 's shield pops and takes the kill

"Whoops"
